Split a string into multiple lines if it's longer than a certain length

Source: R/VisualizeDesign.R
INTERNAL_.AddNewLine.Rd

Split a string into multiple lines if it's longer than a certain length

.AddNewLine(st, lineWidth)

Arguments

st

A string
lineWidth

The maximum length of a line

Value

A string
